definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: home of Balsam;—c. [[ה]] loc. [[פְּת֫וֹרָה]] Nu 22:5, faqoura, A Baqoura; [[אֲרַם]] ´[[פ]] [[נַהֲרַיִם]] De 23:5, but om. ´[[פ]] LXX ;—cf. As. Pitru (on W. bank of upper Euphr.) Schr KGF 220; COT Nu 22, 5 Dl Pa 269 Dr Hastings DB; Eg. Pe-d-ru WMM As. u. Eur:291.
